title: Hotels.com: Travel Booking
description:
Find and book your perfect somewhere with the Hotels.com app. 

GET REWARDED THROUGH OUR APP  
 Access Member Prices* of 10% or more on over 100,000 hotels worldwide. 
- Join One Key‚Ñ¢, our travel program that unlocks a world of instant benefits and perks. 
- Earn OneKeyCash‚Ñ¢** and use this whenever you want and instantly save on your next trip on Hotels.com, Expedia and Vrbo when you book eligible hotel stays, flights, vacation rentals, car rentals, and more. 
- One Key Silver, Gold and Platinum members can enjoy extra perks at select VIP Access properties. 

 
FIND THE ONE THAT‚ÄôS JUST RIGHT FOR YOU
- Choose from over 500,000 properties worldwide.  
- Whether you‚Äôre planning a short hotel stay, last minute weekend getaway, long vacation, business trip, or anything in between, we have a property for every kind of travel. 
- Enjoy the flexibility of free cancellation on most hotels***. 
- Compare hotel prices, ratings and amenities side-by-side using our comparison tool. 
- Use Trip Planner to organize your travel plans in one place. Save your favorite hotels, vacation rentals, resorts and more, and share these with friends and family.    
- See the hotel or vacation rental location on a map and read verified guest reviews. 
 
FAST, EASY, & SECURE BOOKING ON OUR APP 
- It only takes a few taps to book your hotel. 
- Pay now or later on most hotels. 
- Save your payment details to book future trips even faster. 
- Last minute hotel booking. 

 
OUR APP IS YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL COMPANION 
- Save your confirmation and access your hotel or vacation rental booking details anytime ‚Äì even offline.

comments: This app used to be wonderful but the changes they have made are just terrible! I hate that they removed the "free parking" filter and the new layout isnt nearly as visually pleasing. The reviews are harder to read and i dont need the map taking up half the space on the page. I have no idea why companies feel the need to change things that aren't broken! Very disappointing! Edit 2/19/2024: dropping score. The changes mentioned by the support staff are even worse!

The app is unusable now. I couldn't do anything because a credit card ad page would popup every 2-3 seconds while I'm trying to read any page I'm on. When I closed the app and reopened it, I was logged out and the "sign-in" button is totally unresponsive. I've tried 7 or 8 times now over the course of a few days. Trash.

Be careful of this app! I have to reset my filters very often, even if I am only enlarging the search area. This is annoying, but even moreso because one of my filters is "reserve now, pay later". I like that this AI somehow works more often when searching for two rooms, each with one person. The competition's search rarely works with that request but this one does. If only it kept the filters in place! Can't recommend this app until it's fixed.

Having the same issue as stated below by another user, can't get logged in to the app regardless if using the correct password or code. Keep receiving an error that "something went wrong on our end." Had issues even getting logged into the website, but finally managed and updated my password, same issue even several hours later. Kinda defeats the purpose of having an app. üôÉ Long-time user and I've actually really liked it up until now, really disappointing.

One of the worst apps I have used. You put in filters and it will bring up hotels without what you choose. It doesn't show you your location on the map so if you are in an unfamiliar area you have to jump between Google maps and the app. The biggest issue I have is it doesn't have a microwave and fridge option in the filter but I doubt it would work if it was there. On top of that you can't copy the address of the hotel to put it into your own maps app

title: Visit A City
description:
Visit A City - The ultimate travel app for planning your city sightseeing trip:
‚Ä¢ Create a customized itinerary and book your tours and activities with just a few taps.
‚Ä¢ Discover the must-see landmarks, historical sites, and hidden gems of your destination with our comprehensive guide.
‚Ä¢ Browse through a wide range of tours and activities, from guided walking tours to day trips and more.
‚Ä¢ With detailed information and reviews, you can easily find the best experiences to suit your interests.
 
No need for multiple apps, Visit A City has everything you need to make the most of your trip. Download now and start exploring!"

Also adding places & hotels does not work by name search anymore. you must enter addresses, this was a great feature to add your hotel or your place by name | Can I get all information regarding local town of India.... | perfect | Was very easy to plan my trip to Southern Spain using this app. Will use in future travels for sure.
recentChanges:
Visit A City, the ultimate travel companion, just got even better! We've added new features to enhance your travel experience, including:
‚Ä¢ Up-to-date attraction information, so you can plan your itinerary with confidence
‚Ä¢ Purchase tours and tickets directly through the app
‚Ä¢ Smart nearby information gives you suggestions for things to do and see based on your location
‚Ä¢ Opening hours, so you can make the most of your time in the city
‚Ä¢ Offline maps
comments: I really like this app but the location thing is really intrusive. Sometimes I just want to check what suggested itineraries there are for a city I'm planning to visit so if I choose to not share my location, I would think it shouldn't be a problem. But when I select not to share my location, the prompt just keeps popping up. And when I leave to go home or sth, it actually goes over that too until I completely close it. A bit annoying. Otherwise, it's a great starting point for researching.

I really like this app for it's suggestions and putting together an itinerary. HOWEVER, I've noticed that a lot of information is inaccurate or out of date, including hours of operation and actual locations/addresses. I wish there were an easy way to submit updated info to the app developer. I would also like to see a way to manually add items to my itinerary (and potentially suggest them as official attractions to include in the app.)

I've really enjoyed using this! It's great for planning tours and excursions when the choices become overwhelming. I've used it for San Diego and San Francisco, and now using it for our upcoming Hawaii trip. Some functionality could be improved on, like setting times for activities, because I use it as a guide and not as a strict itinerary. Overall, great site and app.

On the surface this app looks great. I planned my itineraries, but didn't book anything with the app. However, once I got to my destination I found out almost all the information was wrong. It couldn't pinpoint my location (I have an international plan) and instead of informing me of that, it would just show me in a wrong location. I couldn't adjust it either. Then every single one of the times to get from place to place was wrong. This app ended up being a huge disappointment.

Perfect for trip planning. Start an itinerary and customize from multiple sights and activities recommended. Once itinerary is started, items are added to a select day of your trip, with a duration at site, and an idea of transportation between sites included. From there you can customize all information and organize in any order you'd like. There's even a map and list view. This app is free, easy to use, and highly recommended for any planners!!

title: trivago: Compare hotel prices
description:
The trivago app is the easy way to search and compare hotel prices from your favorite booking sites so you can find a hotel or accommodation in the location you want, with the amenities you need, and for a deal you‚Äôll feel amazing about.

- Compare accommodation prices from major booking sites with one search
- Get exclusive mobile rates on your phone or tablet
- Get price drop alerts for your favorite hotels 
- Save favorite accommodations and compare them side-by-side
- Read aggregated guest reviews from multiple booking sites
- Search over 5 million properties in more than 190 countries and find amazing hotel deals

No matter what type of traveler you are, or what type of budget you have, the trivago app makes your hotel search simpler than ever.

Compare prices from hundreds of booking sites
With trivago, you don‚Äôt just search for hotel offers in your dream vacation destinations, you also get to compare prices from the major booking sites like Expedia, Hotels.com, Accor, ZenHotels, Booking.com, Trip.com, Priceline, TravelUp, Orbitz, HotelTonight, and more. With over 5 million hotels and other accommodations to choose from worldwide, finding the right stay at the right price doesn‚Äôt get much easier than this.

Mobile rates for deal-hunters on the go
The trivago app features deals on hotels that you can only access on your mobile device ‚Äî something all you deal-hunters out there won‚Äôt want to miss out on. Just search for your hotel like you normally would, and keep an eye out for the ‚Äúmobile rate‚Äù badge to know when you‚Äôve found a special deal.

Get a heads-up when prices drop
Have a trip coming up and want to try and book your stay for cheap? Now you can sign up for price drop alerts on the trivago app to stay on top of price changes for your favorite hotels. Instead of constant searching, you‚Äôll get notified as soon as prices drop so you can act fast and get an awesome deal.

Save hotels and compare them side-by-side
Whether your dream hotel is pet-friendly, has late-checkout, offers free cancellation, or includes a breakfast buffet, the trivago app makes it easy to save your favorite stays. When you feel like booking your trip, you can compare chosen hotels side-by-side to see how they match up before making your decision, so can always be confident you got the right stay at the right price.

Real talk from real guests 
Along with always-updating price information, the trivago app aggregates guest ratings from major booking sites to give you the best understanding of real-world experiences at each hotel. The trivago rating index creates a combined score of available ratings so that you can see what other guests have to say, and always be ready to book your room with confidence.

5 million hotel beds and counting
With over over 5 million properties in more than 190 countries, you can find the perfect stay for every trip on the trivago app. Find rooms at boutique hotels, luxury hotels, airport hotels, hostels, bed and breakfasts, lodges, vacation rentals, resorts, and everything in between with one simple search.

Download trivago‚Äôs free app today and start searching, comparing, and saving on your next adventure.

My worst experience was I booked a place that was a great deal. I booked my airfare. Found out the technology they use doesn't prevent overbooking. It happened to me AS I was flying there.

title: GetYourGuide: Travel & Tickets
description:
Download the GetYourGuide app to discover and book unforgettable travel experiences anywhere in the world.

Whether you're planning a vacation or looking for last-minute things to do in any destination, we make booking tours, day trips, and activities easier than ever. 

Choose from culture, food, adventure, nature, and more experiences.

Maximize your trip with exclusive access to the world's top attractions and museums, find the highlights and hidden gems, and keep up with last-minute travel deals using the app ‚Äî we make travel planning easy, and making memories easier.

Find over 100,000 experiences - ‚ÄçBooking tickets for unmissable sights has never been easier ‚Äî experience the Colosseum, Eiffel Tower, London Eye, TV Tower, Sagrada Familia, and more.

Discover expert-guided tours ‚Äî explore unforgettable travel highlights in Paris, Dubai, London, Florence, New York City, Berlin, Vienna, New Orleans, Cancun, Tuscany, Lisbon, and more. 
Our app will be your city guide for destinations around the world, and our local experts help you get fully immersed.

Travel with flexibility:
* Reserve now, pay later ‚Äî save your place for popular experiences early and make your payment at a later date.
* Instant confirmation ‚Äî whether you're booking tours in advance or need last-minute tickets, receive your tickets and booking confirmation instantly.
* Offline tickets ‚Äî Conveniently access your booking information offline. Download, store, and present your tickets on your mobile device

Book with confidence
* 24/7 customer service ‚Äî Easily find help when you have questions. We offer customer service by email, phone, and WhatsApp across multiple languages.
* Flexible cancellation ‚Äî Don‚Äôt stress if your plans change. We offer free cancellation up to 24 hours before your activity for most bookings.

With tours and activities for any interest, you can plan your trips your way. Dive into nature and explore fjords in Norway, try local cuisine across Europe, or uncover fascinating history in the United States.
Whether you're:
- living the magic of the wizarding world on a Harry Potter experience, 
- savoring delicious culinary delights on a food tour of Barcelona, 
- booking top rated tours to see the Vatican,  
- following a city guide through Berlin,
we guarantee you‚Äôll find something unforgettable to do ‚Äî make the most of your travel and leisure time.

Uncover the top tourist activities in the world's bucket-list destinations:
- Book museum tours and tickets in Rome, 
- food trips through Naples, 
- trekking in Iceland, 
- river cruises around Prague, 
- outdoor adventures in Bali, 
- sightseeing in Budapest, and more.

Use the app as a travel planner or for travel guidance, then book travel experiences for the world's must-see highlights with excursions and last-minute tickets.

Tell us how we‚Äôre doing:
* Leave us a review if you‚Äôre enjoying your GetYourGuide app experience or head over to our help page for further assistance: www.getyourguide.com/contact

comments: I love GET your Guide!, I have used it since it first came out, and have booked countless activities from Mont St Michelle to Pompeii to Windsor Castle, abd the Eiffel Tower. Multiple times. I want my bookings to stay in my profile, so I can use the tour I liked again. When we upgrade app, they seem to disappear. This would make it better. Thanks!

BEWARE! This is the worst app and very false advertising when it comes to its 24 hour cancellation policy. If I could give negative stars, I would. I purchased 2 tickets today for an aquarium and within 1 hour I tried cancelling but they said my 24 hour period ended yesterday, when I didn't even have tickets! Not only this app but the place lead you in false advertising. I wouldn't use this app again even if it is the only way to purchase tickets. SUCKS!

My experience was very bad. The booking went smooth, but I booked 2 events and I did need to cancel one of them. From the application I tried to cancel the booking and got a message saying something went wrong and then contacted the support who took very long time then said they can't refund and cancel. I wouldn't recommend this app or their system.

I've used this app for several trips now. Had some excellent tours, and a few marginal ones. But my biggest issue is from our recent trip to Spain. I had booked a number of tours in 3 cities. All were booked in March for the Oct trip. And even though my credit card was the same as when booked, their system decided I was a risk because of booking too many activities. It didn't decide this until it was time for activites. As a result, we missed two planned activities.

Avoid GetYourGuide! Double-charged due to app glitch when booking. Spent three frustrating hours trying to get a refund, customer service refused. Two bookings missing initially, so I rebooked. Days after contacting them it was added to my profile (scammy), but no refund issued despite obvious proof. Screenshots are crucial of EVERY step of the booking process! Customer service may request more details here, but it is a deceptive tactic to give YOU a false sense of security that they care.

title: TREBEL: Music, MP3 & Podcasts
description:
TREBEL Music is the only free music app that let's you listen to your favorite music offline, on-demand, and anytime!

Make music better with TREBEL!

TREBEL Music is the ultimate music app for you! It's a free, offline music player that lets you discover and download unlimited music anytime, anywhere.

With TREBEL Music, you can easily find your favorite tracks, artists, and albums, or discover new ones with our curated playlists. Choose from new releases or all-time favorites, spanning genres like Hip Hop, Pop, EDM, Rap, Country, Latin, R&B, Reggaeton, and more.

 Wherever you go, music follows: Download music for offline listening and save your data for other adventures. 

Break out of your musical routine and find your new musical obsession with our immersive, smart ‚ÄúDiscover‚Äù section. 

Shake up your soundtrack and expand your musical horizons with our instant playlist creator, powered by AI. 

Unleash your inner DJ! Enjoy on-demand playback with unlimited skips and  without limitations such as shuffle-only modes. Create and share your playlists to match your unique vibe. 

All of your songs, one place: Easily import your existing mp3 music library into TREBEL! 

TREBEL Music is completely free - no subscription or credit card required.

TREBEL is a licensed service with the best music in the world.

HIT US UP BELOW!
www.trebel.io

recentChanges: We‚Äôre always making changes and improvements to Trebel Music. To make sure you don‚Äôt miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.
comments: Wow, the number of ads is intolerable. If you try to download a playlist, you'll have to watch at least 1 video ad for every single song you want to download. Oh you want to search something? Here's an unrelated YouTube video that's going to pop up and auto play for an hour, and there's no way to avoid it besides closing and reopening the app. I'm willing to watch some ads for free music, but I won't use something where I get a pop up at least every 20 seconds.

My favorite free music stream app, love that you can listen to songs in library without wifi enabled and that it can rum in the background of other apps. Only ever have am issue with the app when simultaneously using treble with my dasher app running as well. Happens once I've accepted a dash and have the map to my location also running in background they will both freeze every once in a while

Great music app for the most part! However, I find it annoying that music will be moved into the cloud when I don't ask it to. I believe this feature should be able to be turned off entirely. Furthermore, it's absolutely ridiculous that music either already on the device (or music that has been downloaded through the app) skips and cuts out if you don't have a decent internet connection. Especially since playing that same music offline is so much more reliable.

Now that i've reached the last song on my download list, It did not load an ad. But then, The next time i download The first song on my next playlist, an ad will pop up immediately. Also the coin system is bs Because I want to listen to the songs That I already have, But I have to download new ones that I never even heard of just to keep Up with the coins so I can listen to my old playlist.

The ad situation is EXTREME. When I'm offline, Trebel is a five star. But when I'm online, the rating drops down to a two. I play a song and every five seconds I get disrupted from an ad video that plays over the song cover. I get that Trebel needs to make money and all, but the ads pause my song and then play another ad over it. Please get this ad disruption fixed soon, thank you

Download Klook to find deals for the best things to do for anytime, anywhere.

A World of Possibilities
There are nearly half a million travel activities across the world waiting for you on Klook. From sightseeing trips and hotel bookings to immersive cultural experiences, we're here to guide you to your world of joy.

Trusted & Top-rated Activities
Explore handpicked experiences and get local insights for hundreds of destinations. Museums in Singapore? Tour packages in South Korea? Or some family attractions nearby? When you're on Klook, you're seeing the best of every place in your hands.

Experiences Made Easy
We make e-booking fast with instant confirmation and skip-the-line tickets on selected attractions. Whether it‚Äôs chasing waves on a Phuket vacation package, tasting wine in Melbourne or finding out what‚Äôs fun for the weekend in your area, you're just a few taps away from booking whatever makes you happy.

Unlock Gold on Klook Rewards for Exclusive Perks 
- Earn up to 3x more Klook credits
- Get up to US$95 in promo codes 
- Skip the line for premium customer support 
- Early access to top deals
- Special Gold-only prices
You can elevate your Klook experience to Gold when you spend US$380 or make 5 purchases of at least US$30 per year.

And a Whole Lot More
- Budgeting when travelling? Use Klook-exclusive promo codes to save on the best deals 
- Redeem your tickets and e-vouchers or download them for easy offline access
- Save your bucket-list holiday ideas to your wishlist and book later

Find us and say hello!

There are nearly half a million travel activities across the world waiting for you on Klook. From sightseeing trips and hotel bookings to immersive cultural experiences, we're here to guide you to your world of joy.

Trusted & Top-rated Activities
Explore handpicked experiences and get local insights for hundreds of destinations. Museums in Singapore? Tour packages in South Korea? Or some family attractions nearby? When you're on Klook, you're seeing the best of every place in your hands.

Experiences Made Easy
We make e-booking fast with instant confirmation and skip-the-line tickets on selected attractions. Whether it‚Äôs chasing waves on a Phuket vacation package, tasting wine in Melbourne or finding out what‚Äôs fun for the weekend in your area, you're just a few taps away from booking whatever makes you happy.

Unlock Gold on Klook Rewards for Exclusive Perks
- Earn up to 3x more Klook credits
- Get up to US$95 in promo codes
- Skip the line for premium customer support
- Early access to top deals
- Special Gold-only prices
You can elevate your Klook experience to Gold when you spend US$380 or make 5 purchases of at least US$30 per year.

And a Whole Lot More
- Budgeting when travelling? Use Klook-exclusive promo codes to save on the best deals
- Redeem your tickets and e-vouchers or download them for easy offline access
- Save your bucket-list holiday ideas to your wishlist and book later
- Choose from trains, buses, cars and even ferries to get around
- Get movie and event ticket discounts and bundles

Find us and say hello!
- Official website: www.klook.com
- Facebook: @klookglobal
- Twitter: @klooktravel
- Instagram: @klooktravel

Got ideas for us? Let us know at appfeedback@klook.com. Thanks bestie.

recentChanges:
What small thing brought you joy today? For us, it's you reading this!

Not much to update this round - just some bug fixes and performance updates.

Oh, but if you're new here, remember to use the promo code "BetterOnApp" on your first booking for 5% off.

Got ideas for us? Let us know at appfeedback@klook.com. Thanks bestie.
comments: Used this for a trip to Cambodia. BIG MISTAKE. No contact information. Some features of the app doesn't work (eg, Ask KLOOK) Lack of customer service. Klook doesn't run the tours. Cannot cancel once booked (they made it impossible to cancel). STAY AWAY FROM THIS APP. if you are trying to book a tour, go to the source directly. KLOOK is just a third party trying to rip off your hard earned money. DON'T GET FOOLED BY THEIR REPLY TO MY REVIEW. PROBABLY COPYING AND PASTING. And DON'T GIVE ME SOME LINK TO CONTACT CUSTOMER SERVICE. THE INFORMATION SHOULD HAVE BEEN ON THE VOUCHER IN THE FIRST PLACE.

Klook has made traveling a little more affordable when it comes to doing fun things. The reason for 3 stars is simple. The customer service area can be a little bit challenging. And if you want a refund they make it harder to get. Overall if your traveling plans go smooth your than klook is worth it. But if you gotta get a refund because of a traveling problem. They make it hard to get a refund. Update 12/24 If you wanna know whats the problem. Please contact me. Or leave a contact email

Booked transportation (Chinichi Co LTD) from my hotel to the airport in Japan. The driver never showed up. Tried calling Klook customer service, only option was virtual chat that was not helpful. Ended up paying twice as much for using transportation to the airport because I had to take a last minute taxi. Save your time and worries, and don't use this app for transportation services. Have not used any other services on the app, and most likely will not based on 1st experience with app.

The app and the website don't work well together. And customer service couldn't help with that. i made my very first booking using the website, and it's apparently impossible to transfer the voucher to the app. Useless.

Klook is a great middle person for travellers and attractions. It helps to streamline everything into 1 common app. Now, sometimes it is better to just buy it from the attraction's official site itself but majority of times, it's actually cheaper here. In terms of user experience, it's easy to use so far. Never had to cancel any booking myself so I can't comment on those experience. And I hope I don't need to.

title: Travelocity Hotels & Flights
description:
Free cancellation on most hotels. Because flexibility matters.

TRAVELOCITY APP FEATURES:

HOTELS
- Last minute hotel bookings welcome & free cancellation available!
- Pay when you book or when you arrive at the hotel. 
- Find hotels, motels, and inns around you on an easy-to-use map view.
- Review descriptions, photos, user ratings, and amenities from verified hotel guests.
- Securely store your payment details for faster, easier, and safe bookings. 

FLIGHTS
- Search and book round trip or one-way flights.
- Sort flights by price, time, or duration from any airline.
- Enter a departure date and destination, and your trip-ready.

ACTIVITIES
- Attraction tickets without the lines.
- Book local tours.
- Airport shuttles & more

MY TRIPS
- Share your travel plans with friends and family via Travelocity's itinerary sharing feature!
- View your record locator, gate information, and upcoming trip details on the go.
- Plan your own vacation packages with activities, hotels, cars, and more.

MANAGE
- Sign in through Facebook, and use the same account across all devices.
- Use the booking tracker to see your past, current and future bookings, even when you‚Äôre offline.

Travelocity gets you to your next destination cheaper than other apps thanks to the Travelocity Price Guarantee.


*APPONLY10 coupon code Terms & Conditions
Subject to the restrictions set out in these terms and conditions, the 10% promotion code may be applied to a qualifying stand-alone hotel (not a hotel booking in combination with any other product such as flight + hotel, or flight + hotel + car) booked on a mobile device or the Travelocity app by March 31, 2023, for 1 or more nights for travel by September 30, 2023. Qualifying bookings instantly receive 10% off at check-out through the use of the promotion code. Customers are limited to one redemption of this promotion code and up to a maximum savings of $150 per booking. After the booking, this promo code will not be able to be used again, even if the booking is cancelled. Exclusions may apply and most major hotel chains are excluded. The promotion code cannot be redeemed against taxes, supplier fees, cancellation or change fees/penalties, administrative fees or other miscellaneous charges, which are the sole responsibility of the customer. Discounts are not redeemable for cash for any reason. Promotion codes are non-transferable, not for resale, and cannot be combined with other offers or used for any booking previously made. Any attempt at fraud will be prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law. Void where prohibited, taxed or restricted by law. Travelocity reserves the right to change or limit the promotion in its sole discretion. Usual booking terms and conditions apply (see https://www.travelocity.com/p/info-other/legal.htm) and all bookings are subject to availability.

The Travelocity app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By using our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies.

recentChanges:
We've updated our app to make it easier for you.

Plan now, travel later with free cancellation on most hotels because flexibility matters.
comments: Do not use Travelocity! The WORST EXPERIENCE EVER! I thought I had booked a room for one night on the same day. I got to the Motel and it had booked me on another day that the app chose for the best price! The clerk spent like 40 minutes speaking to Travelocity. So I decided to go through my app and got everything straight or so I thought.. finally the clerk said it will still be a while. I had enough. I had to be somewhere in a hour. Tried to get a refund and they refused. No humanity at all!

The gentleman at check in was very nice, friendly and professional. Unfortunately, while the room was very clean, it was also very austere. no attempt at any ambiance. No closet, only one night stand, and absolutely nothing on the walls. Also, a one inch gap at the bottom of the entry door which allowed a cold draft until we stuck a towel along the gap. Will not stay there again.

Date auto reset placing the reservation on the wrong date... they corrected the issue... then the reservation I made got canceled without any notification because the hotel was overbooked... they worked furiously for a half hour to find a room, but there is no availability, so they sent me an email to send a receipt when I found a room. So they charged me with no place to sleep on vacation. Thank you travelocity... you suck!! Perhaps only the first part was the apps fault, but...

I used Travelocity all the time, but the app will not let me sign in. Every time I try to put my credentials in, it lets me put the first letter in and then nothing else after. I have deleted the app and re downloaded it several times with the same issues. This has been going on since June because I had another trip then and I had the same issue.

The customer service is terrible even if you give them a lot of business like me they will not care. Note: even if you pay the insurance $9.00 you can not change reservations BE AEARE. The app is a scam because they let that option be enabled in some non refundable cases. Cherry on the top: you'll get zero points for traveling, also ZERO benefits for long time customers. I will never recommend this app, think twice and save your money.

title: Trip.com: Book Flights, Hotels
description:
Trip.com app is your one-stop travel platform! Book with us for great deals on: 

‚óè Flights: International and domestic flights at great rates
‚óè Hotels: Choose from over 1.2 million hotels, resorts, and apartments around the world
‚óè Trains: Book tickets for United Kingdom, Germany, Italy, Spain, France, Switzerland, South Korea, and more

New features:
‚óè Discover Low-priced Flights by Map: You can now find cheap flights more easily than ever! Browse the map and find great deals for places around the world. View prices for multiple destinations at a glance.
‚óè Real-time Flight Status Tracking: Easily check your flight status in the app and get the latest updates instantly.
‚óè Customise Your Flight with Add-ons: You can now add insurance coverage for everything from flight delays to last-minute cancellations.

All of this is combined with our excellent customer support, which you can access anytime, anywhere with the Trip.com app. Reach out to us easily by making an in-app call or sending us a quick message. Our global call center is also available 24/7 and renowned for its rapid response time.

Download the Trip.com app now to experience our seamless booking process and award-winning customer support!

 Detailed Features List: 

Book hotels and find great deals on amazing stays! On Trip.com, you can browse stays to suit your tastes from total selection of more than 1.4 million options worldwide. Whether you're in the mood for a money-saving apartment stay or a luxury five-star hotel, a cozy holiday inn or a fun-filled resort, it's easy to find the right accommodation.

Book flights seamlessly with NO booking fees! Flights to around 5,000 cities worldwide are available in the Trip.com app. Pick your preferred class ‚Äì or even book a chartered flight! The Trip.com app lets you filter by price, flight duration, travel time, airline, or number of stops. Pick a multi-city itinerary, and you can even fly into one city and out of another. With Trip.com it's easy to find your perfect flight. 
 
Book trains across the world, easily!  On the Trip.com app, you can now book trains for mainland China, Taiwan, Korea, UK, Italy, Spain, France, and Germany. We connect directly with train information centers for updated schedule information and prices. Our app lets you search quickly through available fares, saving you time and money. 

Rent cars at thousands of destinations worldwide!  Rent cars on Trip.com and choose from all makes and models. With Trip.com, there's no need to drive the same car twice. Don't worry if your plans change, most cars can be booked flexibly with free cancellation.

Book tours and tickets on Trip.com and see the best of your destination! From a trip to the Great Wall to a one-day Dubai stopover. Visit Disneyland, get skip-the-line passes for the Louvre, or take off in a hot air balloon. Whatever experiences a destination has to offer, you can find out what's happening and book your tickets, all on Trip.com.

Book airport transfers easily. When you book airport transfers with Trip.com, your driver will be kept up-to-date with your flight schedule, so you can travel worry-free even in the case of flight delays. Free cancellation is available up to 24 hours before your scheduled pick-up time.

Trip.com: Your personal trip advisor. Trip.com is a global community of travelers. You can share Trip Moments with like-minded adventurers, and find exciting travel lists and gourmet recommendations in return. 

Get Trip.com NOW to experience the seamless one-stop booking process and let your next adventure begin!

Have a good trip!

developerAddress: 72 Anson Road, #12-01 Anson House, Singapore (079911),  Singapore
recentChanges: Keeping travelers safe and informed is our top priority. You can check the latest national and regional travel restrictions directly on the app. Trip.com will keep you updated as the situation changes.
comments: Have used the app for years of travel, and have recently had a few issues with it. The most jarring being arriving at the train station and seeing the train had been canceled. Trip didn't notify me of this, and didn't refund their booking fee, as, "the tickets had been issued successfully." It's ridiculous to pay a fee for a service that wasn't fruitful. Had to change to a flight, and pay two taxi fees. Needless to say I booked the alternative flight via a different app.

BAIT AND SWITCH Disappointed. App shows a tremendous deal on an upcoming flight that I want to book. Via the airline's website, the cost is about $900. Trip's cost was closer to $500. Same flights/same days. Great deal, right!? As I'm trying to book it, a pop-up message appears "Sorry. This flight just sold out." Attempted to book another flight to a different location... EXACTLY the same pop-up. Bait and switch. Sketchy. Do not recommend!

BAIT AND SWITCH Disappointed. App and website shows a tremendous deal on an upcoming flight that want to book. As soon as you try to book it, a pop-up message appears "Sorry. This flight just sold out." Attempted to book another flight to a different location... EXACTLY the same pop-up. Bait and switch. Sketchy. Do not recommend!

Kind of misleading. Started with a web search showing a room available, but needed an account to access the deal. I downloaded the app, only to find the room was "sold out". I doubt it was ever available in the first place. Also the app spams me with notifications. Even worse, there's a 7 day waiting period to delete my account (linked to Google).

Imo, the main metrics of quality of a travel app are cost and the simplicity of getting returns. The cost differs on destinations, so I won't say much. The return policy is weird. They are honest when you did everything right, but the interface is so ambiguous that you are likely to commit some error while attempting to. And then they'll blame their app's fault on you and not fix the issue. I lost 660 USD this way.

title: Hostelworld: Hostel Travel App
description:
The world‚Äôs leading travel app & trip planner for backpackers on a budget who want to stay in the best hostels, have fun experiences and mix with like-minded travellers. With new friend-making features, it‚Äôs even easier to go from solo to social before your plane hits the runway. 

 Make new travel besties with super social features
+ Instantly connect and chat with your fellow hostel travellers as soon as you book
+ Share experiences that are right up your street by joining local chat groups based on your interests
+ View travellers‚Äô profiles from around the world and see where people have adventured to
+ See exactly who will be at your hostel when you are
+ Build your own traveller profile & expand your travel network
+ Share memes or discuss travel dreams: join our online community and find top tips for your next adventure

Find affordable accommodation in unmissable locations
+ Search from over 16,500 hostels in 180 countries 
+ From cheap hostels in Europe to eco hostels in Southeast Asia
+ Book private rooms or shared dorm rooms (mixed or all-female options available)
+ Filter by location, price, room type, facilities and more on our booking app 
+ The best hostels for any budget. Making travel possible for everyone.

Tried, tested and trusted travel app
+ Helping backpackers and solo travellers ‚ÄòMeet the World‚Äô for over 20 years
+ Real reviews from over 13 million+ passionate travellers
+ Rated on value, location, atmosphere etc. by previous guests

Find events and experiences
+ Discover hostel events and local plans
+ Find FREE activities, helping you meet like-minded travellers
+ Fun experiences to suit any backpacker or solo traveller. Walking tours, yoga, pub crawls and more
+ Join a Roamies group tour to explore iconic destinations while staying in the world‚Äôs best hostels

Packed with plenty of perks
+ FREE cancellation available on all hostel bookings (we know travel plans can change)
+ Translate up to 43 languages using the ‚ÄòHostel Speak‚Äô feature
+ Use your location to easily find the perfect hostel stay near you

recentChanges: We‚Äôve been working on improvements so that you can have a better user experience while using Hostelworld‚Äôs App! This update also includes some bug fixing.
comments: Great app that makes searching and booking easier! It also allows you to meet with other people in chats beforehand. I absolutely love this app and use it whenever I solo travel. Heck, some of these places, I'd even have a friend book their own stay with me! So worth it for socialization. You just have to do your research on the hostels themselves because hostelworld essentially is creating a search engine and a profile that allows you to connect with hostels around you!

I used to love this app, but it just updated and seems to have gotten rid of all the features I loved the most. You can no longer save favorites or make lists of hostels which is SO frustrating. Also, you used to be able to click the location and read written directions on how to get to the hostel from the owners before you book. It was so helpful seeing thos instructions before booking, not just having Google maps.

They absolutely need to bring back the ability to create lists and save favorites. This is how I plan my trips ahead of time, and I've actually lost a ton of my research for a trip I've got coming up next week. I have no idea why they would have removed this. You also can't see a map of locations anymore, so it's fairly useless to try and book a decent location without having something else open to check every single one. I'll be using a different app until they fix this.

Used to be a big fan of this app, but suddenly all my lists for planning upcoming trips are gone--i had spent hours reviewing properties & bookmarking the best places. Just gone & I need to book in the next few days! SO FRUSTRATING! Can no longer view any of the properties I've stayed at previously or even the cities or countries. Clearly didn't care at all about the user's needs when designing this garbage update. I dont have any reason to use this app anymore. I'll look for something else.

I used to love this app and used it consistently for travel throughout 2019 and beyond till now. They recently did an overhaul of the app design and they took away Favoriting and having lists of hostels of the ones you favorited. It now makes it so much more difficult to keep track of the ones you want to stay in, the ones you liked when reading descriptions, and harder to narrow down where to stay when you can't click the simple heart to favorite a hostel and see it when scrolling through.

title: Polarsteps - Travel Tracker
description:
Plan, track, and relive your travels. Record your route automatically, keeping your phone in your pocket and eyes on the world.

Over 5M+ travelers have chosen Polarsteps to create and capture their adventures. This all-in-one travel app shows you the world‚Äôs most enticing travel destinations, gives you insider tips and plots your route, locations and photos when the journey is underway. The result? A beautiful digital world map that is unique to you! As well as the chance to turn it all into a hardback Travel Book when you‚Äôre done. And it doesn‚Äôt stop there...

Doesn‚Äôt drain your battery, works offline and you have full privacy control.

PLAN

‚ñ† Polarsteps Guides, created by our travel-loving editors and other explorers like you, show you the best of the world (as well as giving you top tips for once you get there).
‚ñ† Itinerary Planner to build your dream (editable) itinerary.
‚ñ† Transport Planner helping you get from A to B with clear transport options between destinations.

TRACK

‚ñ† Automatically track and plot your path on a digital world map (that grows fuller as your passport does).
‚ñ† Add photos, video, and thoughts to your steps along the way making your memories all the more vivid.
‚ñ† Save spots that you love so that you can always find your way back.

SHARE

‚ñ† Leave tips for the traveling community on where to go and what to see.
‚ñ† Share your journey with friends and family if you want to. Or keep it to yourself. You have full privacy controls.
‚ñ† Follow others and share in their adventures.

RELIVE

‚ñ† Retrace your steps ‚Äì scrolling through places, photos, and your travel stats.
‚ñ† Create a unique Travel Book filled with your pictures and stories with the touch of a button.

WHAT THE PRESS ARE SAYING ABOUT POLARSTEPS

"The Polarsteps app replaces your travel journal, making it easier and more beautiful." - National Geographic

"Polarsteps helps you track and share your journeys in an easy and visually appealing way." - The Next Web

"Polarsteps' resulting travel log is impressive, and is the source of a severe case of itchy feet in your correspondent." - TechCrunch

FEEDBACK

Questions, thoughts, or feedback? We'd love to hear what you think about Polarsteps. Get in touch via support@polarsteps.com.

Plan, track, and relive your travels. Record your route automatically, keeping your phone in your pocket and eyes on the world.

Over 5M+ travelers have chosen Polarsteps to create and capture their adventures. This all-in-one travel app shows you the world‚Äôs most enticing travel destinations, gives you insider tips and plots your route, locations and photos when the journey is underway. The result? A beautiful digital world map that is unique to you! As well as the chance to turn it all into a hardback Travel Book when you‚Äôre done. And it doesn‚Äôt stop there...

Doesn‚Äôt drain your battery, works offline and you have full privacy control.

PLAN

‚ñ† Polarsteps Guides, created by our travel-loving editors and other explorers like you, show you the best of the world (as well as giving you top tips for once you get there).
‚ñ† Itinerary Planner to build your dream (editable) itinerary.
‚ñ† Transport Planner helping you get from A to B with clear transport options between destinations.

TRACK

‚ñ† Automatically track and plot your path on a digital world map (that grows fuller as your passport does).
‚ñ† Add photos, video, and thoughts to your steps along the way making your memories all the more vivid.
‚ñ† Save spots that you love so that you can always find your way back.

SHARE

‚ñ† Leave tips for the traveling community on where to go and what to see.
‚ñ† Share your journey with friends and family if you want to. Or keep it to yourself. You have full privacy controls.
‚ñ† Follow others and share in their adventures.

RELIVE

‚ñ† Retrace your steps ‚Äì scrolling through places, photos, and your travel stats.
‚ñ† Create a unique Travel Book filled with your pictures and stories with the touch of a button.

WHAT THE PRESS ARE SAYING ABOUT POLARSTEPS

"The Polarsteps app replaces your travel journal, making it easier and more beautiful." - National Geographic

"Polarsteps helps you track and share your journeys in an easy and visually appealing way." - The Next Web

"Polarsteps' resulting travel log is impressive, and is the source of a severe case of itchy feet in your correspondent." - TechCrunch

FEEDBACK

Questions, thoughts, or feedback? We'd love to hear what you think about Polarsteps. Get in touch via support@polarsteps.com.

recentChanges:
- Explore the adventures of your friends! Follow more friends via the suggested friend feature and find ‚Äúfriends of friends‚Äù who also use Polarsteps.
- We have refreshed the experience of adding and editing your trips in the app.
- Lastly, as always, we also fixed some bugs.
comments: I use this app for tracking where I've been. It's very useful and cool. Easy to use, intuitive. I haven't tried the more advanced features but based on how well the app works overall, I would expect them to work very well. I took one star off after my last trip because of the app's tendency to go to sleep for hours, leaving long straight lines that don't capture the detail of an otherwise complex route, which is unfortunate.

I am using PolarSteps for the first time and am loving it. I don't have data on this trip and the app still is able to identify where I've been. There's so much this app does. I've been sharing it with other travelers as well. Some things I would like the developers to consider moving forward. Ability to: *add contributors so all on trip can participate *add captions to pictures *rearrange actual steps We are still traveling, so I will have to come back to review the photo book. ‚ù§Ô∏è this app

I love this app, not only to share my travels with family and friends but also to look back myself! I would love it if pictures could be placed on maps automatically (from the photo meta data) - strava has been doing that for years! I'd really like to add past trips, especially backpacking trips, for which I didn't have my phone on, but it's too much work to do it manually.

i love this app! couple thoughts:. it would be great if you added a feature to drop a "waypoint". it's not actually a step that you document but it does you to more accurately Mark a path. the second option would be to make points on the journey moveable. sometimes the app puts a point thats not accurate. would love the oportunuty to move it.

Awesome! Helps organize where you are going step by step and how you get there.(DRIVE/FLY/BUS/COMBO)You also get a base price on gas&mileage. The Maps are really helpful, Though I still had to use Google maps for more detailed route information. It would be really cool to add a toll calculator as well as a tool to calculate food cost. Another cool feature is the app does a count down till you leave and tracks your progress as you go, grouping pics each day. So it's cool if you go off route.

title: American Airlines
description:
With the American Airlines app, you‚Äôre covered with the information you need exactly when you need it. Need a mobile boarding pass? Wondering where the closest Admirals Club¬Æ lounge is located? All of this info, and more, is available at your fingertips. 

-Dynamic home screen: Knows where you are in your travel journey and gives you easy access to the right tools at the right time.

-Mobile boarding pass: Check in for your trip and retrieve your mobile boarding pass. No need to print, and it‚Äôs updated along the way.

-Flight updates:  Get the latest Ô¨Çight updates by simply retrieving your reservation and allowing American Airlines to send notiÔ¨Åcations to your mobile device.

-Interactive terminal maps: Navigating airports is a breeze with our interactive terminal maps. Find the closest Admirals Club lounge or get directions to your connecting gate. 

-AAdvantage¬Æ account details: Review all the details of your AAdvantage account right from the app. Not an AAdvantage member? Sign up today.

-Upgrade your seat: Request and purchase upgrades with ease. Want to see where you are on the list? The app displays the upgrade standby list within four hours of your scheduled departure. 

-Seat selection: Select or change your seat within the app. Just pick the one you‚Äôd like and change it on the spot. 

-Track your bag: Know exactly where your bag is from the time it leaves your hands to when you extend the handle at your Ô¨Ånal destination. 

-Save your reservation: Your recently viewed reservations are automatically saved in the app so you can easily grab the details for your next Ô¨Çight in seconds.

-Wi-Fi access in the air: Don‚Äôt forget on flights with Wi-Fi, you can use the American app and aa.com to check flight information and watch movies and TV shows at no cost. 

Contact Us: 800-222-2377

Why we need the permissions:

Bluetooth
We will be adding location assistance to mapping (see our new terminal maps) that uses BLE

Location
Your location helps us give you relevant information tailored to where you are at the time.
 
Photos/Media/Files
Access to photos is required to store parking reminders.
 
Camera
The camera allows the app to scan credit cards and expedite the checkout process.
 
Wi-Fi connection information
This allows the app to understand when connectivity exists to give you the data you need.  
 
Other
Other various permissions allow the app to: receive google notifications, process notifications while the device is trying to sleep, access American‚Äôs web services, and vibrate for important messages.

recentChanges: We‚Äôre continuing to work behind the scenes to improve your app experience
comments: This app is pretty good for most things like booking flights, checking statuses, getting alerts. Unfortunately, it's nearly unusable when trying to change flights. It's a nonzero chance that trying to change your flight will cancel your entire reservation with no notice or refund. Best case scenario is it takes you 10 tries to make a change. Hopefully they make some improvements.

Won't display boarding passes. Kind of removes benefit of having an app if I still need to go to a counter to get it printed out. It's like the most important function of this app and it fails. If it can only do one thing, it should be displaying boarding passes. How can you mess up the most important job? Happened to another individual here and they missed their plane. Do better.

Please Do better. Instead of all the annoying pop-ups and non intuitive layout, make it easier to access user profile, make changes. Auto add TSA pre check to ALL boarding passes automatically when you have an up-to-date KTN in the app. Make the chat bot actually function like a helpful human instead of just being a waste of time. In short, be less terrible.

Glitches often, wont process changes, wont display boarding passes when it should. Requires a new check in everytime you open it, even if you've previously checked in for your flight. I also once had it display that my flight was cancelled when it wasnt. Just a bad experience all around. The other airline apps I use dont seem to have these problems.

Can't even get started. Filled out all required fields for signing up, and after clicking on "submit" it says "Sending Enrollment". And it will say "Sending Enrollment" for 20-30 minutes without actually sending anything. (it wouldve gone for longer but that's about when I figured it just wasn't going to happen)I tried multiple times with the same result. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling, still can't get signed up.

title: Vrbo Vacation Rentals
description:
Stay with Vrbo to get more stays. Introducing One Key, the first loyalty program from any major vacation rental platform. One Key is a loyalty program that rewards you no matter how you travel. You‚Äôll earn rewards across Vrbo, Expedia, and Hotels.com, and you can redeem those rewards the next time you book an eligible vacation home, flight, a hotel, car rentals, and more. 

Whether you‚Äôre looking for an A-frame, a beach house, or a condo, it‚Äôs on Vrbo. Find the place for you and your people. 

- EARN OneKeyCash‚Ñ¢ and use it across Vrbo, Expedia, and Hotels.com
- SEARCH for unique places to stay in 190+ countries 
- PLAN and collaborate with your people using Trip Boards and group chat
- BOOK securely from your phone or tablet
- TRAVEL anywhere and share trip details with your group 

EARN
‚Ä¢ One Key is the first loyalty program from a major vacation rental platform.
‚Ä¢ Book and earn rewards on vacation rentals.
‚Ä¢ Use OneKeyCash across Expedia, Vrbo, and Hotels.com. 
 
SEARCH
‚Ä¢  Browse private vacation homes complete with pools, backyards, and more. 
‚Ä¢  Find unique vacation homes not listed on other platforms. 
‚Ä¢  Filter by preference: price, location, amenities, and more.
‚Ä¢  See property photos and reviews at a glance.
‚Ä¢ Have questions about a property? Get quick answers from our virtual assistant. 
 
PLAN
‚Ä¢ Tap the heart icon to save and compare your favorites easily. 
‚Ä¢ Invite friends and family to join your Trip Board.
‚Ä¢ Leave comments and vote for your favorite properties.
‚Ä¢ Keep your trip conversations in one place and chat with your group in real-time from anywhere. 
 
BOOK
‚Ä¢ Have questions? Message the owner or manager to ask about the property.
‚Ä¢ Book and pay securely on the Vrbo app with your credit card.

TRAVEL
‚Ä¢ Quickly access important booking details like check-in instructions, WiFi passwords, and arrival information, even when offline.
‚Ä¢ Share important trip details with your people by adding them to your trip.
‚Ä¢ Access your conversations and message homeowners from your device anytime.
 
Note: Unless otherwise noted, currency is displayed as USD in the property listings. Please visit www.vrbo.com/mobile for more information about the Vrbo app.

comments: Worst experience with this app. It was fine before but since the recent merger I have issues every time I use this app. Recently wanted to send message to host and it tells me I can not do it at this moment... have tried for 3 days with same result. Also wanted to cancel a reservation and it tells me to sign in by the way I am signed in!!!!! Terrible get your acr together oh and by the way also one of my recent bookings never showed in the app!!!

I've used VRBO for years without issue. But this merge with Expedia has been a HUGE detriment to this site/app and has made the user experience ridiculously frustrating. Couple examples, won't save info so I have to enter log in info on the app every single use, my inbox routinely glitches out and I can't access messages, the map just won't load vs list ... literally every time I use the app something goes wrong. Such a shame. Used to be such a great platform.

I am trying to look at all my saved properties, but it just goes to trips, and then tells me I have no bookings. I CANNOT book if you don't let me see my saved properties. My friends and I go on trips a couple times a year and I have a bunch of rentals I wish to see so I can actually pick a property to stay. very disappointed. GalaxyNote20 I tried using a desktop, and I have to reload the website after every property I click on, or it doesn't let me see if place is available on wanted dates.

Barely functional now. The change to 'One Key' has really destroyed the user friendliness the app once had. Sharing doesn't work properly and trying to navigate anywhere in the app sends you back to the 'One Key' home page at which point you have to click on VRBO in the footer to get back to the actual app and start completely over because it dumps everything you were searching or reload your trip to try and find the property you were looking at. Twice I just gave up & went with AirBnB instead

Considering that most people probably use the mobile app to interact with VRBO, you would think the app would be more mobile friendly. The ability to share properties with your group via text message, using the share button, should be easy. The whole app is very glitchy right now. Like the view payment part is barely legible. (Too dim). Love VRBO. Just don't love the app, as it is now.

title: Turo - Find your drive
description:
Turo is the world‚Äôs largest peer-to-peer car sharing marketplace where you can book any car you want from local hosts across the US, UK, Canada, France, and Australia. Whether you're flying in from afar or looking for a car down the street, searching for a rugged truck or something smooth and swanky, guests can take the wheel of the perfect car for any occasion, while hosts can take the wheel of their futures by building an accessible, flexible, and scalable car sharing business from the ground up.

Whether it‚Äôs a truck to help on moving day, a swanky exotic for a luxurious weekend away, or a classic cruiser for a picture-perfect road trip, with thousands of vehicles listed worldwide, Turo lets you find the perfect vehicle for your next adventure.

Upgrade your travel plans
‚Ä¢ Choose from a totally unique selection of cars and drive the perfect one for your trip
‚Ä¢ Book cars directly from local hosts
‚Ä¢ Safely access cars through a variety of contactless check-in options
‚Ä¢ Get the car delivered, and book trips on the go with a quick tap

Start your own car sharing business
‚Ä¢ Share your car and build a car sharing business with Turo
‚Ä¢ Start with a car you already own or buy one to share ‚Äî any car owner can start exercising their entrepreneurial muscles
‚Ä¢ Choose how many cars to share, scale your business up or down however you want, and decide how to reinvest your earnings
‚Ä¢ Whether you want to commit a lot of time or a little, you can earn at home or on the go, on your schedule, and divest any time
‚Ä¢ Rest easy with liability insurance from Travelers Excess and Surplus Lines Company backing each trip

Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

comments: I don't have a credit card or a lot of money for needless deposits and hidden fees... Turo saved my trip from Maine to the west coast for the first time. I was able to rent a nice car at a very reasonable price, many options, many cars, everything is clear, no hidden fees, they accept chime debit cars!!!! I just can't say enough about it. Thank you for being real.

Update: something is wrong with the app, constant loading screens that eventually tell me I'm offline when I'm not and random server errors. also, the estamates are just wrong even if I don't update anything... I've had two fantastic experiences using this service. a cheap car in Hawaii and a super expensive car on the mainland with absolutely no problems. soooooo much cheaper, easier and faster then going through an actual car rental agency. plus I actually know the vehicle I will for sure get.

Great alternative to the rental car companies. Sometimes the prices are better and other not. Suggestions that would encourage me to book more. 1) list the full price on search. I hate "hidden fees" and I have to pay that and tax anyway, so why not be transparent? 2) you can't see price for the same dates your already booked. Why? Maybe another car comes up with a better price that I'd want to book. Make that option available please.

The idea and the service is solid, but the app and system behind it is not very stable. When I was supposed to be returning my last rental, the Turo system was down nationwide and I could not select my "trip" in the app to digitally return the rental, but the app could still spare the bandwidth to tell me that I was running late and would be charged extra for going over my rental time, even though the car had already been returned to its owner in the real world.

Doesn't connect to Android auto. The range definitely is below average so take that into consideration when planning your trip. None of the high speed chargers in the area worked, so be sure to plan extra time for charging. I was billed a 20x chargring fee at the end of the trip because Andrii picked up the car from the airport charger sooner than it took to finish charging. So, it was OK, but not great. I wouldn't rent a BMW hydrid again.
